text: Benton County is a county in Indiana. Its county seat is Fowler. About 93% of the land in the county is used for growing crops, mainly corn and soybeans. == Cities == There are no cities in this county. The largest town, Fowler, in 2020 had a population of 2,337. == Towns == *Ambia *Boswell *Earl Park *Fowler *Otterbein *Oxford == Wind farms == There are three large wind farms in the county: * Benton County Wind Farm - 135 turbines * Fowler Ridge Wind Farm - 460 turbines * Hoosier Wind Farm - 53 turbines == References == Category:Indiana counties Category:1840 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Indiana
title: Benton County, Indiana
